metadata.synopsis: A teenager (Courtnee Draper) discovers her mother's fiance and her own future stepsister (Tamara Hope) are actually aliens hiding out on Earth.

reviews: Gentle alien comedy deals with challenges of a new family.
"Stepsister" definitely has that certain goofy charm that makes so much of Disney's fare light and likable: everyone smiles, nobody gets hurt, and fantasy looms large.
